meanings.definition: A large baleen whale with a series of longitudinal folds of skin running from the mouth to the navel.
meanings.sent1: The rorqual swam gracefully through the ocean, its skin folds rippling in the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the rorqual to learn more about its unique skin structure.
meanings.sent3: The rorqual decided to wear a fashionable scarf made of its own skin folds.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a rorqual's skin folds, unwavering and strong.
meanings.sent5: Children gasped in awe as they watched the majestic rorqual glide by.

meanings.definition: Any whale of the family Balaenopteridae, including the blue whale and humpback whale.
meanings.sent1: The rorqual family includes some of the largest whales in the world.
meanings.sent2: Tourists on the boat were thrilled to spot a rorqual breaching in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The rorqual family reunion was a sight to behold, with whales of all sizes coming together.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the room like the call of a distant rorqual.
meanings.sent5: The rorqual's presence in the ocean is a testament to the beauty of marine life.
